QuestData.Title: Champion Armaments
QuestData.Description:
People today see a dead body and they just think its a smelly pile of goo, not me I tell ya. I see it as a little present holding wonderful secrets.
For a price, Ill share those secrets with you too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place a workorder for Champion armaments and equipment.

Objectives.Objective: Place a workorder for Champion armaments
